award-group.award-id: 21st Century Science Initiative Collaborative Award in Understanding Dynamic and Multi-scale Systems

institution-wrap.institution: Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada

award-group.award-id: RAPIDD program of the Science and Technology Directorate Department of Homeland Security and the Fogarty International Center

funding-group.funding-statement: Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation ( https://www.gatesfoundation.org/) Grant OPP1091919 (BTG); the RAPIDD program of the Science and Technology Directorate Department of Homeland Security and the Fogarty International Center ( https://www.fic.nih.gov/Pages/Default.aspx), National Institutes of Health (BTG); the National Science Foundation ( https://www.nsf.gov/) Grant CCF 1917819 (SAL); the James S. McDonnell Foundation ( https://www.jsmf.org/) 21st Century Science Initiative Collaborative Award in Understanding Dynamic and Multi-scale Systems (SAL), and the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council (NSERC) of Canada ( http://www.nserc-crsng.gc.ca/index_eng.asp) through a Postgraduate Scholarship-Doctoral to C.M.S.-R. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
